Title: Verify presence of Referrals page elements in Miscellaneous component
Desc: Validates that key interactive elements for the Referrals tab rendered by Miscellaneous.jsx and ReferralTable component are present and visible. This test ensures all critical UI components for referrals functionality are rendered correctly on page load.
Detailed Steps:
1. Verify [data-testid='miscellaneous-container'] is visible
2. Verify [data-testid='tabs-container'] is visible
3. Verify [data-testid='referrals-tab'] is visible
4. Verify [data-testid='referral-table-container'] is visible
5. Verify [data-testid='referral-table'] is visible
6. Verify [data-testid='add-referral-button'] is visible
7. Assert all referral-related elements are visible using expect(element).toBeVisible()

Title: Validate search button disabled state until valid mobile number entered
Desc: Ensures the search button remains disabled until a valid 10-digit mobile number is entered. This test validates input validation and button state management.
Detailed Steps:
1. Open add referral row by clicking [data-testid='add-referral-button']
2. Verify [data-testid='mobile-search-button'] is visible
3. Verify [data-testid='mobile-search-button'] is disabled initially
4. Fill [data-testid='mobile-search-input'] with '123' (invalid length)
5. Verify [data-testid='mobile-search-button'] remains disabled
6. Fill [data-testid='mobile-search-input'] with '1234567890' (valid 10 digits)
7. Verify [data-testid='mobile-search-button'] becomes enabled
8. Assert button state changes correctly based on input validation

Title: Search referrals by existing referrer mobile number and select result to populate form
Desc: User searches for a referrer by mobile number '9999999999'. The search results display in format 'abc - 9999999999' (name - mobile with space and dash). Clicking on the result populates the referral form fields and displays data correctly in table columns.
Detailed Steps:
1. Click [data-testid='add-referral-button'] to open the add referral row
2. Wait for [data-testid='mobile-search-input'] to be visible
3. Fill [data-testid='mobile-search-input'] with value '9999999999'
4. Verify [data-testid='mobile-search-button'] is enabled
5. Click [data-testid='mobile-search-button']
6. Wait for search results popover to appear (timeout: 5000ms)
7. Verify search results are displayed in format 'name - mobile' (e.g., 'abc - 9999999999')
8. Locate and click on the search result item containing '9999999999'
9. Verify popover closes after selection
10. Verify [data-testid='mobile-search-input'] is populated with '9999999999'
11. Verify referrer name field is populated with the name from search result (extracted from 'name - mobile' format)
12. Verify referrer type (person type) is populated in the form row
13. Verify referral form row displays: mobile in first column, person type in second column, name in third column
14. Assert all form fields and table columns are populated correctly from the selected search result

Title: Save referral after populating form and verify data in table
Desc: After populating the referral form by searching and selecting a referrer result, clicking the save button should save the data and the referral should appear in the table with all columns populated correctly.
Detailed Steps:
1. Open add referral row by clicking [data-testid='add-referral-button']
2. Wait for [data-testid='mobile-search-input'] to be visible
3. Fill [data-testid='mobile-search-input'] with value '9999999999'
4. Verify [data-testid='mobile-search-button'] is enabled
5. Click [data-testid='mobile-search-button']
6. Wait for search results popover to appear (timeout: 5000ms)
7. Locate and click on the search result item containing '9999999999'
8. Verify form fields are populated (mobile, referrer name, person type)
9. Select referral type from [data-testid='referral-type-select']
10. Verify [data-testid='save-referral-button'] is enabled
11. Get initial table row count from [data-testid='referral-table']
12. Click [data-testid='save-referral-button']
13. Wait for API call to complete (timeout: 5000ms)
14. Verify success toast is visible using locator('.Toastify__toast--success')
15. Verify toast message contains 'successfully'
16. Verify new referral row appears in [data-testid='referral-table']
17. Verify table row count increased
18. Locate the newly added row containing '9999999999'
19. Verify all columns are populated: mobile in first column, person type in second column, name in third column, referral type in fourth column
20. Verify [data-testid='delete-referral-button'] is visible in the new row
21. Verify saved referrer name matches the selected referrer name
22. Assert referral data is correctly saved and displayed in table

Title: Handle error toast when referrer not found with searched mobile number
Desc: Validates error handling when searching for a referrer with a mobile number that does not exist in the system. An appropriate error toast should be displayed with the specific mobile number in the message.
Detailed Steps:
1. Open add referral row by clicking [data-testid='add-referral-button']
2. Wait for [data-testid='mobile-search-input'] to be visible
3. Fill [data-testid='mobile-search-input'] with value '1252535467'
4. Verify [data-testid='mobile-search-button'] is enabled
5. Click [data-testid='mobile-search-button']
6. Wait for error toast to appear (timeout: 5000ms)
7. Verify error toast is visible using locator('.Toastify__toast--error')
8. Verify toast message contains 'Referrer not found with this mobile: 1252535467'
9. Verify toast has id 'miscellaneous-referrer-search-error'
10. Verify no search results popover appears
11. Verify [data-testid='mobile-search-input'] retains the entered value
12. Assert error handling works correctly for non-existent referrer

Title: Click add referral button to open referral form
Desc: Validates that clicking the add-referral-button opens the referral form row and makes all form fields accessible. Tests the button's functionality and form visibility toggle.
Detailed Steps:
1. Verify [data-testid='add-referral-button'] is visible
2. Verify [data-testid='add-referral-button'] is enabled
3. Click [data-testid='add-referral-button']
4. Wait for form to open (timeout: 1000ms)
5. Verify [data-testid='mobile-search-input'] is visible
6. Verify [data-testid='referral-type-select'] is visible
7. Verify [data-testid='add-referrer-button'] is visible
8. Verify [data-testid='save-referral-button'] is visible and disabled
9. Verify [data-testid='add-referral-button'] is hidden when form is open

Title: Open Add New Referrer popover and verify fields
Desc: Validates that clicking the add-referrer-button opens a popover with all required fields (Type, Name, Mobile) and the Create button. Tests popover functionality and field visibility.
Detailed Steps:
1. Ensure add referral row is open
2. Verify [data-testid='add-referrer-button'] is visible and enabled
3. Click [data-testid='add-referrer-button']
4. Wait for popover to open (timeout: 5000ms)
5. Verify [data-testid='add-referrer-popover-content'] is visible
6. Verify [data-testid='referrer-type-select'] is visible
7. Verify [data-testid='referrer-name-input'] is visible
8. Verify [data-testid='referrer-mobile-input'] is visible
9. Verify [data-testid='create-referrer-button'] is visible and disabled initially
10. Assert all popover fields are present

Title: Validate Create Referrer button enablement after filling all fields
Desc: Ensures the Create Referrer button becomes enabled only when all required fields (Type, Name, and 10-digit Mobile) are filled with valid values. Tests form validation logic.
Detailed Steps:
1. Open add referral row
2. Click [data-testid='add-referrer-button'] to open popover
3. Verify [data-testid='create-referrer-button'] is disabled initially
4. Click [data-testid='referrer-type-select'] and select first available option
5. Fill [data-testid='referrer-name-input'] with 'John Doe'
6. Fill [data-testid='referrer-mobile-input'] with '9876543210'
7. Wait for validation to complete (timeout: 1000ms)
8. Verify [data-testid='create-referrer-button'] becomes enabled
9. Assert button state changes based on field validation

Title: Create new referrer with valid data
Desc: Validates the complete flow of creating a new referrer. After successful creation, the referrer data should populate the referral form fields and the popover should close.
Detailed Steps:
1. Open add referral row
2. Click [data-testid='add-referrer-button'] to open popover
3. Select a valid type from [data-testid='referrer-type-select']
4. Fill [data-testid='referrer-name-input'] with a unique name
5. Fill [data-testid='referrer-mobile-input'] with a unique 10-digit mobile number
6. Verify [data-testid='create-referrer-button'] is enabled
7. Click [data-testid='create-referrer-button']
8. Wait for API call to complete (timeout: 5000ms)
9. Verify success toast is visible using locator('.Toastify__toast--success')
10. Verify popover is closed
11. Verify referral form fields are populated with created referrer data
12. Assert referrer creation was successful

Title: Validate Save Referral button disabled state until all fields valid
Desc: Ensures the Save Referral button remains disabled until all required fields (mobile, referrer type, referral type, and referrer name) are filled with valid values. Tests referral form validation by creating a new referrer through the add-referrer popover and then saving the referral.
Detailed Steps:
1. Close any open popovers
2. Ensure add referral form is open by clicking [data-testid='add-referral-button'] if needed
3. Clear any existing data in the form
4. Verify [data-testid='save-referral-button'] is initially disabled
5. Click [data-testid='add-referrer-button'] to open popover
6. Wait for [data-testid='add-referrer-popover-content'] to be visible (timeout: 5000ms)
7. Click [data-testid='referrer-type-select'] and select first available option
8. Fill [data-testid='referrer-name-input'] with 'Test Referrer'
9. Fill [data-testid='referrer-mobile-input'] with a unique 10-digit mobile number
10. Verify [data-testid='create-referrer-button'] is enabled
11. Click [data-testid='create-referrer-button']
12. Wait for API call to complete (timeout: 2000ms)
13. Verify success toast is visible using locator('.Toastify__toast--success')
14. Verify popover is closed
15. Wait for form state to update (timeout: 500ms)
16. Verify [data-testid='save-referral-button'] is enabled after creating referrer
17. If save button is not enabled, select referral type from [data-testid='referral-type-select']
18. Verify [data-testid='save-referral-button'] is enabled
19. Click [data-testid='save-referral-button']
20. Wait for API call to complete (timeout: 2000ms)
21. Verify success toast is visible with message containing 'successfully'
22. Verify [data-testid='referral-table'] is visible
23. Locate the referral row containing the created referrer mobile number
24. Verify all columns are populated: mobile in first column, person type in second column, name in third column, referral type in fourth column
25. Verify saved mobile number matches the created referrer mobile
26. Verify saved name matches 'Test Referrer'
27. Assert referral data is correctly saved and displayed in table

Title: Verify referral data displayed in table columns
Desc: Validates that all referral data is correctly displayed in the respective table columns (Mobile, Person type, Name, Referral Type). Tests data rendering and column alignment.
Detailed Steps:
1. Ensure at least one referral exists in the table
2. Verify [data-testid='referral-table'] is visible
3. Locate the first referral row in the table
4. Verify the row contains mobile number in first column
5. Verify the row contains person type (referrer type) in second column
6. Verify the row contains referrer name in third column
7. Verify the row contains referral type in fourth column
8. Verify [data-testid='delete-referral-button'] is present in the row
9. Assert all columns display correct data

Title: Delete referral and verify removal from table
Desc: Validates the deletion flow for a referral. After successful deletion, the referral should be removed from the table and a success toast should be displayed.
Detailed Steps:
1. Ensure at least one referral exists in the table
2. Locate a referral row in [data-testid='referral-table']
3. Note the referral details (mobile, name) for verification
4. Click [data-testid='delete-referral-button'] in that row
5. Wait for API call to complete (timeout: 5000ms)
6. Verify success toast is visible with message 'Referral deleted successfully'
7. Verify the deleted referral row is no longer visible in the table
8. Verify other referrals (if any) remain in the table
9. Assert deletion was successful and table updated correctly
